content: Indium provides AI and analytics services including MLOps, NLP, and computer vision.
Indium has experience in BFSI, healthcare, retail, manufacturing, technology, and more industries.
Indium offers Product Engineering services including architecture design, microservices, and cloud-native technologies.
Indium delivers Intelligent Automation solutions such as AI-powered process mining, RPA, and workflow orchestration.
Indium provides Quality Engineering with AI-driven testing, continuous integration, and DevOps automation.
iXie Gaming, a division of Indium, offers end-to-end gaming services including game development, QA, and animation.
Success stories demonstrating Indium's impact in digital identity security, pharma, social media, consumer electronics, and financial services.
Thought leadership articles discussing agile transformation, generative AI for business intelligence, and AI in regression testing.
